title: Exhart Solar Memorial Rock Statue w/Angel, LED Flowers,Durable Resin Yard/Garden Marker,7.5"x4.5"x6"
features: HEARTWARMING ANGEL GARDEN STATUE: Exhart’s garden statues may be used simply for the pure love of angels or as wonderful garden marker to honor a dearly departed soul.
SOLAR POWERED: This energy-efficient garden decor has a built-in solar panel that charges in the sun and automatically illuminates at dusk for a loving presence day and night.
GLOWING FLOWERS: This rock statue is adorned with flowers and 9 solar powered LEDs that will illuminate at dusk. Enjoy in your garden art day and night.
BUILT TO LAST: Our yard decorations are made from durable, weather-resistant resin finished to look like expensive stone. Through the rain or shine, this solar decor will look stay looking beautiful.
THOUGHTFUL GIFT: This piece makes a thoughtful gift to show your love of angels and or to show your support for the loss of someone dearly loved.
description: An adorable angel lays on this beautiful solar memorial rock. Watch as the solar powered LED lights illuminate the flowers all around this lovely garden decor. Makes a heartwarming addition to your garden.

title: UJBE New Angel Cross Memorial Sympathy Gifts
Solar Garden Gnome Crackle Glass Ball Lights Flower Pot
Angel Memorial Sympathy Gift
